overview: ABOVE THE BELOW is a TV-documentary directed by Harmony Korine. It in part concerns David Blaine's 2003 stunt in which he was sealed in a transparent case suspended 30 feet in the air near the River Thames, London, without food, for a period of 44-days.  Beyond that there are scenes of strange spectators and Blaine wandering the streets of London making pranks and so forth...
title: David Blaine: Above the Below
